text: Map of Russia with Volgograd Oblast highlighted This is a list of rural localities in Volgograd Oblast. Volgograd Oblast (, Volgogradskaya oblast) is a federal subject (an oblast) of Russia, located in the Volga region of Southern Russia. Its administrative center is Volgograd. The population of the oblast was 2,610,161 in the 2010 Census. == Alexeyevsky District == Rural localities in Alexeyevsky District: * Alexeyevskaya * Andreyanovka * Arepyev * Arzhanovskaya * Barminsky
